about_the_game:
Dave is an ordinary bird. Just looking for food. And he makes "caca".

Fly with Dave through a park at night and collect as many points as possible.


If Dave hits objects such as lamps or rubbish bins with his excretions, you score points.

Find out which things bring the most points. Let yourself be surprised what you will discover and beat the high score!
That's it.

But be careful: Not everyone is willing to be pooped on by a bird.


Probably asking yourself what makes this game so special and why should I spend my money on it?



  • Play with Dave! You won't find Dave in any other games
  • Relaxed gameplay
  • The perfect game for a break
  • Also kids could play this game - it's easy to learn and easy to play
  • And: Your money will help other people because I donate the net profit to a German NGO

Not convinced yet? Then look at Dave with that cute cat head...

Dave is an ordinary bird. Just looking for food. And he makes "caca".

Fly with Dave through a park at night and collect as many points as possible.


If Dave hits objects such as lamps or rubbish bins with his excretions, you score points.

Find out which things bring the most points. Let yourself be surprised what you will discover and beat the high score!
That's it.

But be careful: Not everyone is willing to be pooped on by a bird.

name: Dave the Bird

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB Video Speicher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256mb Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Tired of Metroidvanias? You can't longer see roguelikes? Then Dave the Bird might just be the game for you! Fly through a park with Dave in this sidescroller/endless runner/highscore game, collect food and poop everything.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Czech, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Assamese, Basque, Belarusian, Bangla, Bosnian, Cherokee, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, Kannada, Kazakh, Catalan, Quechua, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Kyrgyz, Konkani, Croatian, K'iche', Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Macedonian, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Uyghur, Urdu, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Yoruba, Zulu, Xhosa
